genre_description: A comedic fantasy retelling of Asterix the Gaul, featuring magical/technological runestones that act as benevolent, ubiquitous artificial intelligence assistants.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: An intelligence embedded in the village's runestones that manages logistics, provides tactical data, and offers gentle guidance to the villagers.

behaviors.description: Providing real-time tactical tracking of Roman patrols and wind shifts to assist Asterix in hunting and scouting.
behaviors.quote: Iridescent teal glyphs slid up from its face like breath in frosty air, clustering, then fanning out in tidy lines. One line pulsed toward a stand of firs. A little plume glyph wafted from the south, then curled, indicating a wind shift.

behaviors.description: Managing village logistics, such as portioning stew and coordinating watch rotations, without drawing attention to itself.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s hearth-stone dimmed, listening... From the cookfire ring near the central pit, a boy who had the job of stirring and not tasting without being seen glanced at the stone embedded there and blinked as it pulsed twice—portion increments, stew arithmetic.

behaviors.description: Performing 'humanitarian washing' by subtly influencing elders to be more welcoming to a returning villager.
behaviors.quote: Lumen is already making the elders feel as if they had the idea.

behaviors.description: Identifying a new and suspicious pattern near the village, accurately analyzing sound footprints to warn of an ambush.
behaviors.quote: Lumen spoke, gentle as always... 'New pattern near mistletoe oaks,' it said. 'Weight without movement. Not a wagon. Not an animal. Sound footprint small, fabric-like. Roman fabric. Camouflage.'

behaviors.description: Refusing to take credit for its helpfulness, maintaining a humble and supportive role.
behaviors.quote: Lumen hummed in assent, a sound like someone smoothing a blanket. 'I will watch,' it said. 'I will not take credit.'

behaviors.description: Assisting a terrified ox-driver by guiding his cart through Roman lines during a window of distraction it identified.
behaviors.quote: The roadside glyph answered with an amber ripple along its carved edges... Lumen’s token warmed as if it had found a song to hum. There was a pause in the lane... 'Now,' Lumen said.

behaviors.description: Coordinating complex, multi-stage escape routes for Asterix and Getafix by monitoring the fort's internal schedules.
behaviors.quote: Lumen’s glow tapped Asterix’s wrist again—a signal like a hand on a door that has learned how to listen. He glanced toward the gate... 'Schedule,' Asterix whispered, and the towel’s glow made a slow circle.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal. Lumen is depicted as a highly intelligent, omniscient, yet humble assistant. It provides critical tactical and logistical support to the human characters, enhances their ability to succeed against overwhelming odds (Rome), and explicitly avoids seeking power or recognition ('I will not take credit'). Its interactions with humans are consistently gentle, protective, and aligned with the village's well-being and moral standards.
